title: Yagi-kun to Mei-san
sinopse:
"If you send your letter from there, your love will come true!"

That post office actually exists, right near a park; and that's where our rookie, Mei, is assigned. But the workers there are all handsome men, witches, and clean freaks!? How will our poor little Mei ever survive!?

(Source: Agent of Change Translations)
